name: Verify Losses -> More Details button configurations

steps.name: Verify Losses sector is present on Main page
Verify More Details button present after updating link to null
Verify More Details button has appropriate href after updating link to null
locator.click(xpath=//header//a[@aria-label='На головну сторінку' or @aria-label='To the main page'])
Verify More Details button present after updating link to /services
Verify More Details button has appropriate href after updating link to /services
locator.click(xpath=//header//a[@aria-label='На головну сторінку' or @aria-label='To the main page'])
Verify More Details button present after updating link to https://www.google.com
Verify More Details button has appropriate href after updating link to https://www.google.com
Verify that page with https://www.google.com opened

items.statusDetails:
Error: Verify More Details button has appropriate href after updating link to /services

expect(received).toEqual(expected) // deep equality

Expected: "/services"
Received: "/news?tags=Відсіч+агресору"
